job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Sr. Software engineer

This role is for a Full-stack Software Engineer that will collaborate to build new AI centric products in the learning space. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them., * Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
     * Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
     * Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum
     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux
     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js
     * React UI/UX
     * LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)
     * Vector indexing/database, RAG, Agents
     * APIs GraphQL, REST
     * Docker, Kubernetes
     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
     * SQL (Postgres RDS), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)
     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS
     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-centric products, utilizing generative AI, LLMs, RAG, and Agents. While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus is on integrating and developing applications around generative AI technologies, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
phrases.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business needs and translate them into technical requirements by working with product owners.

phrases.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
phrases.justification: This involves understanding how new features fit into the broader business and technical landscape, requiring business context.
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and vector databases are key components of data pipelines for GenAI applications, involving data preparation and indexing for retrieval.

phrases.phrase: Some knowledge and experience of AI/ML software engineering
phrases.justification: This is a general statement indicating involvement with AI/ML models.

phrases.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
phrases.justification: Directly mentions the use and application of generative AI, which is core to modeling in this context.
Specifies the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) and embedding models, which are types of generative models.
RAG and Agents are techniques used in conjunction with generative models for specific tasks, implying model adaptation or application.

phrases.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
phrases.justification: Suggests research and development, which can include exploring and prototyping new model approaches.
Indicates a broad software development role, encompassing front-end and back-end.

phrases.phrase: collaborate to build new AI centric products
phrases.justification: Focuses on building products, which requires software development.

phrases.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
phrases.justification: Core software development activities including design, development, and maintenance.
Development and utilization of APIs are fundamental to software development, especially for integrating AI features.
Indicates front-end software development for user interfaces.
These are programming languages used for software development.
These are standard tools for containerization and orchestration, crucial for deploying and managing applications, including AI models.

phrases.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI
phrases.justification: Cloud platforms are essential for deploying and managing production systems, including AI services.
Messaging queues are used in distributed systems for reliable communication between services, often part of production pipelines.
